string.text: Hidden Threat: The Beginning
The commander gave a mission: to find the black cat in the dark room.\n Ask Colonel Kuznetsov about the mission in more detail.
Hidden Threat: Surviving Stalker

There was no further substantial information from Kuznetsov concerning my assignment. Also, the colonel instructed me to check what happened to the stalkers in the Darkscape. At the farm, which is on Cordon, there is a stalker who survived the attack on the Sawmill. Will have to use disguise to talk to him.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov.
Something went wrong and the stalker is dead. Inform Kuznetsov of the failure.
Hidden Threat: Get to the Sawmill in the Darkscape
It's worth looking around the Sawmill yourself, looking for any useful information that might shed some light on the events that took place here in the recent past.
Hidden Threat: Examine the Sawmill Building
It's worth looking around the Sawmill yourself, searching for any useful information that might shed some light on what happened here in the recent past.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov
Found not much, to say the least. Nothing more to do here, it's time to go back to the commander with a report.
Hidden Threat: Disable Brain Scorcher

"Brain Scorcher" is seriously hampering military operations in the north. Kuznetsov has given a difficult assignment: to deal with it. The scientists on Yantar must have already figured out a way to do it. We need to talk to Sakharov.
Hidden Threat: Return to Colonel Kuznetsov.
"Brain Scorcher is disabled. Remains to report to the colonel.
Hidden Threat: Get to the Jupiter plant.

An "SOS" signal was received, from the squad that Degtyarev had sent, on a secret mission. It was reported that the squad was attacked on the territory of the factory "Jupiter" by unknown and they urgently need fire support.
Hidden Threat: Inspect the production facilities of the "Jupiter" plant
At the entrance of the plant is empty, from the administrative premises, the same sound. We need to go further into the production facilities.
Hidden Threat: Examine the bodies of the attackers

Soldiers are dead, could not be saved. What mission they performed at the plant, only Degtyarev knows. Unknown stalkers gave me a warm welcome. They were looking for something at the plant. Hmm... Chevrons with symbols unknown to me. Perhaps the colonel knows more. We should get at least one.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Kuznetsov.
The unknown stalkers, had patches with unknown to me symbols. Perhaps the colonel knows more about them.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov.
Lieutenant Kirillov asked me to stop by and see him. Find out what he needs from me.
Hidden Threat: Take the radio military in the Dark Valley
All it takes is a little work as the letter carrier Pechkin. I think I can handle it. A detachment of military guards the entrance to the "X-18" in the Dark Valley, and waiting for my package.
Hidden Threat: Repel the ISG attack.
Oh, man! Wrong time, wrong place. I need to organize a defense.
Hidden Threat: Examine the attackers.
Alright. Alive and well, that's good. We need to examine the attackers for useful information.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov.
Found a PDA on one of the ISG mercenaries, most likely it was the commander of the group. PDA is blocked, our technician should be able to cope with this, let him cast spells, maybe come out hacking.
Hidden Threat: Waiting for Kirillov to unlock the PDA
Kirillov said that the hacking will not take much time. A day or more. We can mind our own business in the meantime.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Lieutenant Kirillov
The technician reports that the PDA seems to have been hacked.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Kuznetsov

On the maps from the PDA, there were marks that I am already familiar with. Jupiter Plant, Plant over X-18. That's where I met up with the ISG. Consequently, the other markers are also the targets of the ISG, I need to report this to Kuznetsov.
Hidden Threat: Meet Sergeant Gorobetz.
The sergeant spotted the ISG group and asked for help. The meeting place is the Hospital in the outskirts of Pripyat. I have nothing else to do, no more tasks the colonel did not give.
Hidden Threat: The Mouse in the Mousetrap.
Hidden Threat: Destroy ISG Sniper

The ISG plans to eliminate Colonel Degtyarev. He doesn't stand a chance. The ISG task force has already been dispatched a long time ago, and I probably won't have time to warn the colonel. But I can take a risk and destroy the sniper and prevent the trap from slamming.
Hidden Threat: Provide fire support to the SSU detachment
The sniper is eliminated. SSU detachment, led by Degtyarev, attacked by the ISG assault group, you need to rush to their aid.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Degtyarev
The ISG group has been eliminated. Talk to the colonel.
Hidden Threat: Find the case in the department store
The colonel instructed him to retrieve the briefcase from the department store, left by an SSU agent.
Hidden Threat: Take the case to the Agroprom
Degtyarev is waiting for me with the case at the military base Agroprom.
Hidden Threat: Talk to Colonel Degtyarev
Received an order from the colonel, return to the base and go to him.
Hidden Threat: Bookmark the Dead City
The task is not dusty, get to the Dead City, and in a house that stands alone in the south-west to lay the recorder.
Hidden Threat: Wait 2 days.
The bookmark is done. Two days to pick it up.
Hidden Threat: To pick up the bookmark from Dead City.
2 days have passed, you need to pick up the recorder and take it to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Return to Degtyarev.
I have the recorder, you need to take it to Colonel Degtyarev.
Hidden Threat: Talk to the squad leader at CNPP.

The ISG are planning to break through the monochrome ones at CNPP. They're most likely already there, and my job is to keep them out of Sarcophagus. My support squad is waiting for me at the arranged location.
Hidden Threat: Go to the northwest of CNPP.

At the main entrance, only mercenaries were found. The ISG could not be found. Squad leader reported that one of his scouts stopped contact. He may have been detected and destroyed, Since the main entrance is not our main target, it is worth checking the road from the Hospital.
Hidden Threat: Eliminate the ISG team.
It's just as I suspected. The mercenaries were distracting the main monochrome forces, and the group of ISG, quietly came in from the side of the Hospital, not attracting attention. To Combat!
Hidden Threat: Report success to Degtyarev
The mission was completed, the group of ISGs was destroyed, and now I have to report to the colonel.
Hidden Threat: Report to Colonel Kuznetsov.
In the absence of Degtyarev, I now once again obey Kuznetsov, and why did he need me? Not a day's peace ...
Hidden Threat: Talk to Major Vereshchagin
To say I was surprised is nothing to say. Major Vereshchagin is the same SSU agent who saved my life in Pripyat, I recognized him. What could have happened to bring him here?
Hidden Threat: To get to the entrance to the Pripyat Underground
It's about time I was done with the ISG My assault squad is waiting for me at the entrance to the Pripyat Underground, on the Jupiter side.
Hidden Threat: Entering the Pripyat Underground.
It's about time we were done with ISG...
Hidden Threat: Eliminate any enemy presence in the Pripyat Underground
It's about time we put an end to ISG...
Hidden Threat: Report success to Major Vereshchagin
ISG is done, the assault was a success, it's time to report to Major Vereshchagin.
[HT]Southern Checkpoint: Hand over the documents
Give the accounting reports to Major Zhurov, at the Southern roadblock Cordon.
[HT]Agroprom: Find courier
Sergeant Lozhkin instructed to find the courier, which is somewhere lost on the road, to the base from the dump. Sergeant is more interested in the package that the courier was carrying for him.
[HT]Agroprom: Return the package to Lozhkin
Sergeant Lozhkin is instructed to find the courier, who got lost somewhere on the road, to the base from the Dump. The sergeant is more interested in the package the courier was carrying for him.
%s, your presence is required at the base. There is an urgent assignment.

Milstalker, our case is still a dead end. But there's a difficult assignment for you. Our northern operations are severely hampered by the Brain Scorcher. Talk to Sakharov on Yantar and find a way to disable it.
Milstalker, come see me, I need to talk to you.
%s, come in for a minute, we need to talk.
%s, about your PDA. Come on over, we got something to talk about.

Hey %s, long time no see. I spotted a group of ISG I can't do this alone, I need help. If you have the guts to go to the hospital in the outskirts of Pripyat, maybe even earn new stripes from the bosses.
Milstalker %s, orders are to arrive at the base and come straight to me.
Milstalker %s, orders to report to me immediately!
Received:
%s: free stalkers - 2 hours
Armistice
%s asked for you. We opened a free pass to our bases for 2 hours. Let's not do anything stupid, if you want to live. Our boys, they don't like warriors very much.
%s truce is over.
Received:
New PDA entry: A note from Sgt. Lozhkin
Military
I see the enemy! To battle!
Place of interest
